name: Dragon Under Pressure
description:
Can you handle the pressure of having to save the world from Cell?

Instructions:

Click the dragon balls to push your kamehameha towards cell.

This is a Dragon Ball Z fan game of one of the most memorable moments of the show. The intense and anxiety inducing kamehameha clash between Gohan and Cell. Give it a try and see if you can defeat him in all the different difficulties.

This is a submition for the MFGG Winter Fangame Jam 2021, hope you enjoy! :)
